title.v: Tạo yêu cầu sản xuất cho lệnh sản xuất
title.e: Auto Generation of Work Order from Manufacturing Order

command.text:
declare @$lockedDate nvarchar(512), @c0 varchar(32), @c1 varchar(32), @f varchar(32), @message nvarchar(512) select @$lockedDate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày giới hạn hoặc ngày khóa sổ.' else N'Data is locked, you must modify system locked date.' end
if not exists(select 1 from dmstt where @ngay_ct1 between ngay_gh1 and ngay_gh2) begin select '' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end if exists(select 1 from dmstt where ngay_ks >= @ngay_ct1) begin select '' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end if exists(select 1 from dmctks where user_id = @@userID and ma_ct = 'SF2' and ngay_ks >= @ngay_ct1) begin select '' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end
select * into #$keys from @keys exec rs_AutoGenerateWorkOrder @ten_lsx, @ten_lsx2, @ma_lo_trinh, @ma_ca, '', @f out, @message out, @@language, @@userID, @@admin if @f is not null begin select @f as field, @message as message return end select '' as field, '' as message, 'refresh$&Identity;$(this);' as script return
